measure.name: res_stock_arguments_post_hpxml
measure.description: Measure that post-processes the output of the BuildResidentialHPXML and BuildResidentialScheduleFile measures.
measure.modeler_description: Passes in all ResStockArgumentsPostHPXML arguments from the options lookup, processes them, and then modifies output of other measures.

argument.name: hpxml_path
argument.description: Absolute/relative path of the HPXML file.

argument.name: output_csv_path
argument.description: Absolute/relative path of the csv file containing user-specified occupancy schedules. Relative paths are relative to the HPXML output path.

argument.name: use_auto_heating_season
argument.description: Specifies whether to automatically define the heating season based on the weather file.

argument.name: use_auto_cooling_season
argument.description: Specifies whether to automatically define the cooling season based on the weather file.

argument.name: heating_setpoint
argument.description: Specify the weekday heating setpoint temperature.

argument.name: heating_setpoint_offset_nighttime
argument.display_name: Setpoint Schedules: Heating Setpoint Offset Nighttime
argument.description: The magnitude of the heating setpoint offset (setpoint is lowered) for nighttime hours. For smooth schedules, nighttime hours occur during the period from 10pm - 7am. For stochastic schedules, nighttime hours can vary.

argument.name: heating_setpoint_offset_daytime_unoccupied
argument.display_name: Setpoint Schedules: Heating Setpoint Offset Daytime Unoccupied
argument.description: The magnitude of the heating setpoint offset (setpoint is lowered) for daytime unoccupied hours. For smooth schedules, daytime unoccupied hours never occur. For stochastic schedules, daytime unoccupied hours can vary.

argument.name: cooling_setpoint
argument.description: Specify the weekday cooling setpoint temperature.

argument.name: cooling_setpoint_offset_nighttime
argument.display_name: Setpoint Schedules: Cooling Setpoint Offset Nighttime
argument.description: The magnitude of the cooling setpoint offset (setpoint is raised) for nighttime hours. For smooth schedules, nighttime hours occur during the period from 10pm - 7am. For stochastic schedules, nighttime hours can vary.

argument.name: cooling_setpoint_offset_nighttime_is_setup
argument.display_name: Setpoint Schedules: Cooling Setpoint Offset Nighttime Is Setup
argument.description: The magnitude of the cooling setpoint offset (setpoint is raised) for nighttime hours. For smooth schedules, nighttime hours occur during the period from 10pm - 7am. For stochastic schedules, nighttime hours can vary.

argument.name: cooling_setpoint_offset_daytime_unoccupied
argument.display_name: Setpoint Schedules: Cooling Setpoint Offset Daytime Unoccupied
argument.description: The magnitude of the cooling setpoint offset (setpoint is raised) for daytime unoccupied hours. For smooth schedules, daytime unoccupied hours never occur. For stochastic schedules, daytime unoccupied hours can vary.
